message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this valuable product. I believe it would be immensely beneficial to you.  To start the conversation, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,400,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I am willing to pay $1,300,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I believe the product's value is closer to my initial proposal. How about we meet in the middle? I'm willing to sell it for $1,350,000.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the product's value, I think a fair price would be $1,325,000.
